price: ߖߊ߲߰ߞߕߊ ߣߊ߬ߕߐ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߡߊ߬ ߞߊ߬ߣߌ߲߫ ߞߵߊ߬ ߘߐ߯ߦߊ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߖߊ߲߰ߞߕߊ߬ ߕߏߒߡߕߊ ߦߋ߫ ߓߋ߬ ߊ߬ ߞߊ߲߬
arabic: مَن يَأۡتِيهِ عَذَابٞ يُخۡزِيهِ وَيَحِلُّ عَلَيۡهِ عَذَابٞ مُّقِيمٌ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: man yatīhi ʿadhābun yukh'zīhi wayaḥillu ʿalayhi ʿadhābun muqīmun
